calculator.title: Position Size Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Maximize your strategy and protect your capital with precision-engineered calculations.
calculator.noResults: Configure your trade parameters above to reveal your optimized position sizes.
calculator.proTip: Pro Tip: Professional traders typically risk 1-2% of their capital per trade. This protects your account from ruin during inevitable losing streaks.

riskReward.title: Risk Profile Analysis
riskReward.tipText: Successful trading is a game of probability. Aiming for a Risk/Reward ratio of 1:2 or higher helps ensure that even with a 50% win rate, your portfolio remains profitable over time.

simulator.title: Risk/Reward Projections
simulator.subtitle: Visualize your potential profitability across different performance benchmarks:
simulator.simulationTipText: These scenarios compare potential returns based on fixed risk. Maintaining a positive expectancy requires focusing on trades where the upside significantly outweighs the downside.

growthSimulator.title: Account Growth Projection
growthSimulator.subtitle: Visualize the long-term impact of your risk settings. This simulation compares your current strategy against a high-risk approach (5x risk) over 20 simulated trades to demonstrate the importance of survival.

hero.title: Master Your Risk
hero.subtitle: Trading isn't about predicting the future. It's about managing what you lose when you're wrong.

philosophy.title: Why This Matters
philosophy.description: The #1 reason traders fail is lack of risk management. Even with a high win rate, a single unmanaged trade can wipe out weeks of progress. This tool ensures you never risk more than you can afford to lose.

precision.title: Mathematical Precision
precision.desc: Calculate exact lot sizes instantly based on your entry and stop loss levels.

visual.title: Visual Analysis
visual.desc: See your Risk/Reward ratios clearly to ensure every trade has positive expectancy.

protection.title: Capital Protection
protection.desc: Prevent emotional trading by strictly adhering to pre-defined risk percentages.

howTo.title: Workflow
howTo.step1Desc: Enter your total account balance in settings.
howTo.step2Desc: Decide how much % of your account to risk (e.g., 1%).
howTo.step3Desc: Input Entry and Stop Loss prices from your technical analysis.
howTo.step4Desc: Use the calculated position size to place your trade.

settingsPage.title: Configuration
settingsPage.subtitle: Personalize your trading environment for maximum efficiency.
settingsPage.capitalDesc: Your total trading account balance. This is the foundation for all position size calculations.
settingsPage.riskDesc: The percentage of your account you are willing to lose on a single trade.

riskWarnings.highPart1: High risk! A losing streak of 5 trades draws down
riskWarnings.aggressive: Aggressive growth. Ensure your win rate is high to sustain this level.
riskWarnings.sustainable: Sustainable zone. Professional traders often stay between 0.5% - 2%.
